title: Along with the Gods: The Two Worlds
genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Thriller, Mystery
overview: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 afterlife guardians. Only when he passes 7 trials over 49 days and proves he was innocent in human life, heâ€™s able to reincarnate, and his 3 afterlife guardians are by his side to defend him in trial.
